welcome to solutious - home of good natured tools
DEVELOPING WEB APPLICATIONS IN TODAY'S WORLD IS NO EASY TASK.
IT REQUIRES SKILL, DETERMINATION and THE RIGHT TOOLS FOR THE JOB.
In the 1900s, you could launch a web site with a handful of HTML and a few CGI scripts. But times have changed and modern problems require modern solutions.
That's why Solutious Incorporated is dedicated to building the best tools money can't buy. We help you get the job done, and done right.
Stella

FANCY A TEST?

Run integration tests with beauty and brute strength

Now in private beta Follow on GitHub

Stella is a testing tool. Define testplans using a powerful Ruby DSL* and let Stella take care of the dirty details (like maintaining values between requests).

Rudy

TO THE SERVERS, PLEASE!

Not your grandparents' EC2 deployment tool

Now in private beta Follow on GitHub

Rudy is a development and deployment tool for Amazon EC2. Define infrastructure and processes using a powerful Ruby DSL* and Rudy takes care of the rest (like creating security groups and keypairs).

* domain specific language

Solutious. There's no prohibition on performance. Copyright 2006-2009.
